item.title: News Archive
item.description: For the latest news items relating to the OSCAL project, please consult the News page. OSCAL 1.1.1 Patch Release - September 12, 2023. OSCAL 1.1.0 Minor Release - July 25, 2023. OSCAL 1.0.6 Patch Release - June 30, 2023. OSCAL 1.0.5 Patch Release - April 18, 2023. OSCAL 1.0.4 Patch Release - May 16, 2022. OSCAL 1.0.3 Patch Release - May 9, 2022. OSCAL 1.0.2 Patch Release - March 20, 2022.
